snippet.title: Yasuke: A Lost Descendant - Official Trailer | Future of Play Direct 2023
snippet.description:
Check out the thrilling trailer for Yasuke: A Lost Descendant, and get a peek at the reveal of a character–Yuuki Yoshihara. Yasuke: A Lost Descendant is an upcoming game that brings super-powered samurai, in-depth parkour movement, and cultural diversity into a 3D anime hack 'n' slash. Yasuke: A Lost Descendant will be available on PC.

#IGN #SummerOfGaming
